column4: I'm going to get an SDHC card and put it into this netbook's internal reader slot and use that as my root disk
the intention is to use a solid state storage device as the root disk and NOT spin up the large storage disk unless I need it (music, video, etc)
set the SSD to mount as / and the HD to /home/
but that will still spin the drive up whenever I do anything that involves writing to /home
